name: Cranberry Orange Tea Bread
author: Mott's
summary: Perfect for a holiday brunch or party, this tea bread is full of delicious flavor. Make extra loaves and keep in the freezer for instant hostess gifts!
ingredients: ¼ cup butter or margarine, melted
directions: Combine flour, dried cranberries, sugar and baking powder in large mixing bowl
In separate bowl, mix together remaining ingredients
Blend applesauce mixture into flour mixture until just combined
Spoon batter into greased loaf pan
Bake at 350 degrees F 45-50 minutes, until toothpick inserted into center comes out clean
Cool 10 minutes in pan before removing loaf to cool completely on wire rack
